description.en: Design applications in society and business. Types of design and historical development. The nature and roles of the designer's work. Design process, projects, and designer skills. Design thinking. Design in the context of management. Design management in large and small companies. Finance and value measurement in design. The relationship between design, branding and innovation. Design management and innovation: at the strategic, tactical, and operational level of the organization. Design audits. Purchasing a design service and preparing terms of reference. Organizing cooperation in a service/product development team. Design project management and evaluation. User-centred approach. Design research. Prototyping. Cooperation with the user (co-creation, open innovation) and other methods. Universal design.
description.et: Disaini rakendused ühiskonnas ja ettevõttes. Disaini liigid ja ajalooline areng. Disaineri töö olemus ja rollid. Disaini protsess, projektid ja disaineri oskused. Disainile omane mõtteviis (design thinking). Disain juhtimise kontekstis. Disainijuhtimine suur- ja väikeettevõttes. Finantsid ja väärtuse mõõtmine disainis. Disaini suhe brändiloomesse ja innovatsiooni. Disainijuhtimine ja innovatsioon: organisatsiooni strateegilisel, taktikalisel ja operatiivsel tasandil. Disainiaudit. Disainiteenuse sisse ostmine ja lähteülesande koostamine. Koostöö korraldamine teenuse/tootearenduse meeskonnas. Disainiprojekti juhtimine ja hindamine. Kasutajakeskne lähenemine. Disainiuuring. Prototüpeerimine. Koostöö kasutajaga (co-creation, open innovation) jt meetodid. Universaaldisain.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to provide knowledge about the design process and its management and the use of design in innovation and the role of innovation in design.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärgiks on anda teadmised disainiprotsessist ja selle juhtimisest ning disaini kasutamisest innovatsioonis ja innovatsiooni rollist disainile.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows the terminology in the field of design, the types of design and principles of cooperation with designers;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) teab disainivaldkonna terminoloogiat, disaini tüüpe ja koostöö põhimõtteid disaineritega;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) knows the role of design in shaping an organization's strategy and creating a competitive advantage;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) teab disaini rolli organisatsiooni strateegia kujundamisel ja konkurentsieelise loomisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) knows the nature of design management and the process of design-based innovation;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) teab disainijuhtimise olemust ning disainipõhise innovatsiooni protsessi;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) knows the principles, methods and application principles of design management at the strategic, tactical and operational level of the organization;
learning_outcomes.et: 4) teab disainijuhtimise põhimõtteid, meetodeid ja disaini rakenduspõhimõtteid organisatsiooni strateegilisel, taktikalisel ja operatiivsel tasandil;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) is able to compile a design brief;
6) is able to compile an audit of the company's design use;
7) is able to evaluate the results and effectiveness of a design project.
learning_outcomes.et: 7) oskab hinnata disainiprojekti tulemusi ja tulemuslikkust.
